title: Gather Requirements
description: Work with stakeholders and conduct user research to clearly define the scope, goals, and functional requirements for the CrossSkillMatchmaker system. Identify key features, data needs, potential integrations with existing systems, and document use cases and edge cases. Incorporate feedback from multiple departments and departments' varying technical expertise.

title: Design System Architecture (Updated)
description: Update the task description to better reflect the specific responsibilities and expectations. The revised design should include: a) overall architecture of the system b) components c) data flow d) integration points e) key considerations for maintainability, scalability, and performance f) implementation of machine learning algorithms where appropriate g) API gateways for service discovery and load balancing h) serverless architectures where feasible i) data privacy and security strategies j) documentation best practices k) future integration with other systems within the organization l) compatibility with industry standards m) a roadmap for the implementation of this design n) testing and documentation for smooth operation and ease of maintenance. Emphasize that the design should adhere to a microservices architecture approach, with a clear separation of frontend and backend. Additionally, provide a more detailed breakdown of tasks within the roadmap, making it easier to understand dependencies between them. Assign this task to the 'code-architect' for further development.

title: Develop Data Model
description: Design and implement the data model for storing employee profiles, skills, interests, and organizational needs.

title: Implement Matching Algorithm
description: Develop the core algorithm for matching employee interests and skills with organizational needs.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for employees and administrators to interact with the system.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system follows best practices for data security, access control, and user authentication.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical specifications, and maintenance procedures.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Plan and execute various types of testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor
description: Deploy the system to production and set up monitoring and logging mechanisms for performance and issue tracking.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
